name: @axelar-network/axelar-gmp-sdk-solidity
description: Solidity GMP SDK and utilities provided by Axelar for cross-chain development

scripts.build: npx hardhat clean && npx hardhat compile && npm run copy:interfaces
scripts.check: npx hardhat clean && npx hardhat compile && npx hardhat check
scripts.copy:interfaces: rm -rf interfaces && mkdir interfaces && cp artifacts/contracts/interfaces/*/*.json interfaces/ && rm interfaces/*.dbg.json
scripts.release: npm run build && npm run flatten && npm run clean:artifacts && changeset publish
scripts.release-snapshot: npm run build && npm run flatten && npm run clean:artifacts && npm version 0.0.0-snapshot.$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) --git-tag-version=false && npm publish --no-git-checks --tag snapshot --access public

author: axelar-network
